description: This file defines the ValyuTools class, which provides an interface to perform various types of searches (academic, web, within papers) using the Valyu API. It includes methods for parsing results, constructing search parameters, and handling API responses.

classes.name: ValyuTools
classes.description: A class that extends Toolkit to provide search functionalities via the Valyu API, including methods for parsing results and executing different types of searches.

methods.name: _parse_results
methods.description: Parses a list of results from the Valyu API into a JSON-formatted string, extracting key fields and limiting content length.

methods.name: _valyu_search
methods.description: Constructs search parameters and executes a search request to the Valyu API, handling optional filters and response errors.

methods.name: search_academic_sources
methods.description: Performs a search across academic sources such as arXiv and PubMed, returning relevant papers.

methods.name: search_web
methods.description: Performs a web search for real-time information based on the query and optional filters.

methods.name: search_within_paper
methods.description: Searches within a specific ArXiv paper URL for relevant sections based on the query.
